summary: An end‑to‑end pipeline that performs image inpainting by encoding input images and masks into latent space, conditioning on a text prompt, running a TensorRT‑accelerated Stable Diffusion denoising process, decoding the latents back to an image, and applying safety checks.
business_intent: Enable fast, cost‑effective image inpainting for content creation, editing, restoration, and other visual AI applications by exploiting GPU‑accelerated TensorRT inference.
